mdBlocks.parent: # 算術演算子
今回は、プログラム上で四則演算（足し算、引き算、掛け算、割り算）を行う方法を学びます。といっても、やり方は非常に単純です。次のプログラムを見てください。
書き方は数学での四則演算に非常に似ていますが、掛け算と割り算だけ記号が少し違うので注意してください。この記号出力は以下のようになります。

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%971.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/442ebb68-da46-4217-b2a5-40ca635f6432/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%971.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZQ4LEPNP%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T051444Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLI5fI%2BZ8wZ%2BrjQw%2FvExgAiE3DWcQwpcvF9N5Q1IULvAIhAOyRK9NP1QxILKs0jPCyylbOGSxM%2F54tOLtLfY2fi1PYKogECP7%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igx3AG1pbzyyS1ZYUcIq3AMimmE1PAiFl4i0ASUYNlJefVr%2B%2FqTTYbenZg62zTNQh2HPtz2fyttGpenk59XVG0apYs%2Bf0kHXKg4gfv8Ntyxv8rrmazkMowBFDt1QwK9Ptt%2Few65Ji4tICgSI9JfBwixmOhLLlSRqRx18h9IK3kT3sVnLrefTqDjd17FTzA%2F4gF8ZNpuKkX3VhK73uHAgX53vzaQlqzhZfFcMnlC7qvmoTKbuVRMNCn%2FPx0OLpk3%2B8rytOadkxG2%2Bt2%2Bke72jVpmkn4nNvyzT6WcyHMabm%2BloIBJMuqdFX1lQe4kwKj8FappOJBkJw5QcBhpNKa%2FbFw071gf9Vsx65eSLc5MS%2BkcOFteU%2FkMW2SoVXFGjouxUj8GuIYs1wV5nNsFUNXngWXUlBWoY%2Fdi6rzIFj%2F5uKkwPQs3nLyIJCRHHq8gukDuJBlpJCfzfz8gcIHRPImyCZr7hxJZMb1%2FMiY4tpCnOR2f%2F7NmzXlU262kkuIpo54IWWIKpMnHKhdAkN3dvdpixtv6LMrk7RiwXiKmKUivl%2BCXQ1UqODKogEWXyN2WqUDHvhwG%2Fb%2FT6ArquX6PuHDE5pjZc0yEqzuOuEi6GhFQXzY5ia40MbrQtH1wLES52%2Fm8vOKGiIQzgNk3wpoTnZjCihtS%2BBjqkARjScXfYwV2UYBWkg9krr71b1cDbjWpYsMIedxjwUPmT%2FYzLKXIX4QGD%2FsRmE6tLnpG6Wh%2FMtgujeVQBwOmSe5NqkGJxmOX5PEI6x12AcaBAuxpUAJwdPN2cSXMrdJCM3C0dZ1%2Bvaf2c0wvZtaJcrv3%2B8NRZo%2F8NV4fWZHzOjxVAh1zZivR5s0D2Quo9kYP6lisYa8LYyuX5FGHDDl%2BjzQIjxX2H&X-Amz-Signature=d3ae4ee4ed3eaf383897388e0f9106670a7b4341a701d406371b84512824160c&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
また、この演算は、変数同士でも同様に行うことができます。以下のプログラムは`v1`と`v2`という二つの変数に対して四則演算を施しています。

```python
v1 = 10
v2 = 5
a = v1 + v2  #足し算
b = v1 - v2  #引き算
c = v1 * v2  #掛け算
d = v1 / v2  #割り算
print("v1 + v2 =", a)
print("v1 - v2 =", b)
print("v1 * v2 =", c)
print("v1 / v2 =", d)
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%972.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/363c5564-51c1-4970-85c2-90196ee666e1/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%972.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZQ4LEPNP%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T051444Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLI5fI%2BZ8wZ%2BrjQw%2FvExgAiE3DWcQwpcvF9N5Q1IULvAIhAOyRK9NP1QxILKs0jPCyylbOGSxM%2F54tOLtLfY2fi1PYKogECP7%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igx3AG1pbzyyS1ZYUcIq3AMimmE1PAiFl4i0ASUYNlJefVr%2B%2FqTTYbenZg62zTNQh2HPtz2fyttGpenk59XVG0apYs%2Bf0kHXKg4gfv8Ntyxv8rrmazkMowBFDt1QwK9Ptt%2Few65Ji4tICgSI9JfBwixmOhLLlSRqRx18h9IK3kT3sVnLrefTqDjd17FTzA%2F4gF8ZNpuKkX3VhK73uHAgX53vzaQlqzhZfFcMnlC7qvmoTKbuVRMNCn%2FPx0OLpk3%2B8rytOadkxG2%2Bt2%2Bke72jVpmkn4nNvyzT6WcyHMabm%2BloIBJMuqdFX1lQe4kwKj8FappOJBkJw5QcBhpNKa%2FbFw071gf9Vsx65eSLc5MS%2BkcOFteU%2FkMW2SoVXFGjouxUj8GuIYs1wV5nNsFUNXngWXUlBWoY%2Fdi6rzIFj%2F5uKkwPQs3nLyIJCRHHq8gukDuJBlpJCfzfz8gcIHRPImyCZr7hxJZMb1%2FMiY4tpCnOR2f%2F7NmzXlU262kkuIpo54IWWIKpMnHKhdAkN3dvdpixtv6LMrk7RiwXiKmKUivl%2BCXQ1UqODKogEWXyN2WqUDHvhwG%2Fb%2FT6ArquX6PuHDE5pjZc0yEqzuOuEi6GhFQXzY5ia40MbrQtH1wLES52%2Fm8vOKGiIQzgNk3wpoTnZjCihtS%2BBjqkARjScXfYwV2UYBWkg9krr71b1cDbjWpYsMIedxjwUPmT%2FYzLKXIX4QGD%2FsRmE6tLnpG6Wh%2FMtgujeVQBwOmSe5NqkGJxmOX5PEI6x12AcaBAuxpUAJwdPN2cSXMrdJCM3C0dZ1%2Bvaf2c0wvZtaJcrv3%2B8NRZo%2F8NV4fWZHzOjxVAh1zZivR5s0D2Quo9kYP6lisYa8LYyuX5FGHDDl%2BjzQIjxX2H&X-Amz-Signature=bd0c451d2ee1ba879ae37e262280767209e454b741a33a0d5e5dd896b2a40c56&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
加えて、Pythonでは次のように割り算のあまりや累乗、小数点以下の切り捨て割り算などを計算することができます。

```python
v1 = 5
v2 = 2
a = v1 % v2     #割り算のあまり
b = v1 ** v2    #累乗
c = v1 // v2    #切り捨ての割り算
print("v1 % v2 =", a)
print("v1 ** v2 =", b)
print("v1 // v2 =", c)
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%973.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/d5814556-dde2-4767-910d-70eb7e81a320/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%973.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZQ4LEPNP%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T051444Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLI5fI%2BZ8wZ%2BrjQw%2FvExgAiE3DWcQwpcvF9N5Q1IULvAIhAOyRK9NP1QxILKs0jPCyylbOGSxM%2F54tOLtLfY2fi1PYKogECP7%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igx3AG1pbzyyS1ZYUcIq3AMimmE1PAiFl4i0ASUYNlJefVr%2B%2FqTTYbenZg62zTNQh2HPtz2fyttGpenk59XVG0apYs%2Bf0kHXKg4gfv8Ntyxv8rrmazkMowBFDt1QwK9Ptt%2Few65Ji4tICgSI9JfBwixmOhLLlSRqRx18h9IK3kT3sVnLrefTqDjd17FTzA%2F4gF8ZNpuKkX3VhK73uHAgX53vzaQlqzhZfFcMnlC7qvmoTKbuVRMNCn%2FPx0OLpk3%2B8rytOadkxG2%2Bt2%2Bke72jVpmkn4nNvyzT6WcyHMabm%2BloIBJMuqdFX1lQe4kwKj8FappOJBkJw5QcBhpNKa%2FbFw071gf9Vsx65eSLc5MS%2BkcOFteU%2FkMW2SoVXFGjouxUj8GuIYs1wV5nNsFUNXngWXUlBWoY%2Fdi6rzIFj%2F5uKkwPQs3nLyIJCRHHq8gukDuJBlpJCfzfz8gcIHRPImyCZr7hxJZMb1%2FMiY4tpCnOR2f%2F7NmzXlU262kkuIpo54IWWIKpMnHKhdAkN3dvdpixtv6LMrk7RiwXiKmKUivl%2BCXQ1UqODKogEWXyN2WqUDHvhwG%2Fb%2FT6ArquX6PuHDE5pjZc0yEqzuOuEi6GhFQXzY5ia40MbrQtH1wLES52%2Fm8vOKGiIQzgNk3wpoTnZjCihtS%2BBjqkARjScXfYwV2UYBWkg9krr71b1cDbjWpYsMIedxjwUPmT%2FYzLKXIX4QGD%2FsRmE6tLnpG6Wh%2FMtgujeVQBwOmSe5NqkGJxmOX5PEI6x12AcaBAuxpUAJwdPN2cSXMrdJCM3C0dZ1%2Bvaf2c0wvZtaJcrv3%2B8NRZo%2F8NV4fWZHzOjxVAh1zZivR5s0D2Quo9kYP6lisYa8LYyuX5FGHDDl%2BjzQIjxX2H&X-Amz-Signature=cb16323fcb980b8b67ba58f5ed67d726015ccc38bdfc9ef4d190e6a60dcafafb&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
これらの `+  -  *  /  %  //` をあわせて、**算術演算子**と呼びます。以下の表に各算術演算子と処理内容を示します。

| 算術演算子 | 処理内容   |
| ----- | ------ |
| +     | 足し算    |
| -     | 引き算    |
| *     | 掛け算    |
| /     | 割り算    |
| %     | あまり    |
| **    | 累乗     |
| //    | 切り捨て除算 |
もちろん、複数の算術演算子を用いて複雑な計算を行うこともできます。その際には数学での計算と同じように掛け算と割り算が優先されますし、`()`で囲って計算順序を指定することもできます。また、`a`や`b`などの変数を介さずとも、計算式の答えをprint関数で直接出力することもできます。

```python
print("上底4, 下底6, 高さ3の台形の面積", (4 + 6) * 3 / 2)
print("半径5の球の表面積", 4 * 3.14 * (5 ** 2))    #4πr^2
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%974.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/b90c7872-7053-4d42-934e-d4d3b0d02f11/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%974.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZQ4LEPNP%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T051444Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLI5fI%2BZ8wZ%2BrjQw%2FvExgAiE3DWcQwpcvF9N5Q1IULvAIhAOyRK9NP1QxILKs0jPCyylbOGSxM%2F54tOLtLfY2fi1PYKogECP7%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igx3AG1pbzyyS1ZYUcIq3AMimmE1PAiFl4i0ASUYNlJefVr%2B%2FqTTYbenZg62zTNQh2HPtz2fyttGpenk59XVG0apYs%2Bf0kHXKg4gfv8Ntyxv8rrmazkMowBFDt1QwK9Ptt%2Few65Ji4tICgSI9JfBwixmOhLLlSRqRx18h9IK3kT3sVnLrefTqDjd17FTzA%2F4gF8ZNpuKkX3VhK73uHAgX53vzaQlqzhZfFcMnlC7qvmoTKbuVRMNCn%2FPx0OLpk3%2B8rytOadkxG2%2Bt2%2Bke72jVpmkn4nNvyzT6WcyHMabm%2BloIBJMuqdFX1lQe4kwKj8FappOJBkJw5QcBhpNKa%2FbFw071gf9Vsx65eSLc5MS%2BkcOFteU%2FkMW2SoVXFGjouxUj8GuIYs1wV5nNsFUNXngWXUlBWoY%2Fdi6rzIFj%2F5uKkwPQs3nLyIJCRHHq8gukDuJBlpJCfzfz8gcIHRPImyCZr7hxJZMb1%2FMiY4tpCnOR2f%2F7NmzXlU262kkuIpo54IWWIKpMnHKhdAkN3dvdpixtv6LMrk7RiwXiKmKUivl%2BCXQ1UqODKogEWXyN2WqUDHvhwG%2Fb%2FT6ArquX6PuHDE5pjZc0yEqzuOuEi6GhFQXzY5ia40MbrQtH1wLES52%2Fm8vOKGiIQzgNk3wpoTnZjCihtS%2BBjqkARjScXfYwV2UYBWkg9krr71b1cDbjWpYsMIedxjwUPmT%2FYzLKXIX4QGD%2FsRmE6tLnpG6Wh%2FMtgujeVQBwOmSe5NqkGJxmOX5PEI6x12AcaBAuxpUAJwdPN2cSXMrdJCM3C0dZ1%2Bvaf2c0wvZtaJcrv3%2B8NRZo%2F8NV4fWZHzOjxVAh1zZivR5s0D2Quo9kYP6lisYa8LYyuX5FGHDDl%2BjzQIjxX2H&X-Amz-Signature=347debd20ca010dfac2099b1304ed38a0e6f7981ca7038ae812ca3e23da78c32&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# 計算をするときの注意点
変数を用いて計算をするとき、その変数の**型**に注意しておかなければ、エラーや意図しない動作を引き起こす可能性があります。例えば、次のプログラムを見てください。

```python
a = 10
b = "5"
c = a + b
print(c)
```
`a`には整数の10が、`b`には**文字列として**5が格納されています。そのため、3行目の計算では数字と文字を足す計算式となっています。これを実行してみると…

![%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%97%E3%81%AE%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/b76772e5-ec9c-41fa-a4f9-a5cb1fc7403d/%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%97%E3%81%AE%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZQ4LEPNP%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T051444Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELX%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLI5fI%2BZ8wZ%2BrjQw%2FvExgAiE3DWcQwpcvF9N5Q1IULvAIhAOyRK9NP1QxILKs0jPCyylbOGSxM%2F54tOLtLfY2fi1PYKogECP7%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igx3AG1pbzyyS1ZYUcIq3AMimmE1PAiFl4i0ASUYNlJefVr%2B%2FqTTYbenZg62zTNQh2HPtz2fyttGpenk59XVG0apYs%2Bf0kHXKg4gfv8Ntyxv8rrmazkMowBFDt1QwK9Ptt%2Few65Ji4tICgSI9JfBwixmOhLLlSRqRx18h9IK3kT3sVnLrefTqDjd17FTzA%2F4gF8ZNpuKkX3VhK73uHAgX53vzaQlqzhZfFcMnlC7qvmoTKbuVRMNCn%2FPx0OLpk3%2B8rytOadkxG2%2Bt2%2Bke72jVpmkn4nNvyzT6WcyHMabm%2BloIBJMuqdFX1lQe4kwKj8FappOJBkJw5QcBhpNKa%2FbFw071gf9Vsx65eSLc5MS%2BkcOFteU%2FkMW2SoVXFGjouxUj8GuIYs1wV5nNsFUNXngWXUlBWoY%2Fdi6rzIFj%2F5uKkwPQs3nLyIJCRHHq8gukDuJBlpJCfzfz8gcIHRPImyCZr7hxJZMb1%2FMiY4tpCnOR2f%2F7NmzXlU262kkuIpo54IWWIKpMnHKhdAkN3dvdpixtv6LMrk7RiwXiKmKUivl%2BCXQ1UqODKogEWXyN2WqUDHvhwG%2Fb%2FT6ArquX6PuHDE5pjZc0yEqzuOuEi6GhFQXzY5ia40MbrQtH1wLES52%2Fm8vOKGiIQzgNk3wpoTnZjCihtS%2BBjqkARjScXfYwV2UYBWkg9krr71b1cDbjWpYsMIedxjwUPmT%2FYzLKXIX4QGD%2FsRmE6tLnpG6Wh%2FMtgujeVQBwOmSe5NqkGJxmOX5PEI6x12AcaBAuxpUAJwdPN2cSXMrdJCM3C0dZ1%2Bvaf2c0wvZtaJcrv3%2B8NRZo%2F8NV4fWZHzOjxVAh1zZivR5s0D2Quo9kYP6lisYa8LYyuX5FGHDDl%2BjzQIjxX2H&X-Amz-Signature=2ef1af0acc2573fda7a0258597ae2a5c85d85df208c36ce1a905f5e9a9760730&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
赤色でエラーが出てしまい、実行ができませんでした。簡単に日本語訳すると「**int型（整数型）とstr型（文字列型）の足し算はサポートされてないやで**」という感じです。当たり前といえば当たり前ですが、このようなミスが規模の大きいプログラムではバグを生み出したりするのです…
> ☝ プログラミングをするときは、常に変数の型を意識しよう！
